Articles.Content:
I have CRP installed, because dependencies. Then I went asteroid mining. Now I find that the asteroid is chock-full of resources I don't even know how to handle in my install (gypsum, anyone?), but holds very little ore. Asteroid recovery crew is stranded in space.

I've asked this over in the Mod thread, but crossposting here because it's the kind of problem that's bound to have been noticed before, and maybe someone already has a solution or workaround up their sleeve. Is there a way to un-CRP the Asteroids, limit the selection of resources or anything along these lines?

Edited August 19, 2018 by Laie

Answering my own question, removing (renaming, whatever) Asteroid.cfg from the CRP folder seems to revert them back to Ore-only. Even works retroactively: reloading the save after getting the file out of the way, I had an ore rock.
